title: Blades Amid Blossoms
overview: When the imperial concubine dies mysteriously among peach blossoms during her visit to Peach Blossom Manor, wandering swordsman Yan Shiyi becomes the prime suspect. Cold Blade, her appointed bodyguard, seals the estate, forbidding anyone to leave. As the inquiry deepens, the manor's hidden sins surface, and the truth grows ever more elusiveâ€¦
